Messages.Author: Markus Feufel
Messages.Content: Dear All, this email is to remind you of the following points:  Please remember that we will not be able to meet this week (on Friday May 31) but will meet again next week (on Friday June 7). Please send me the presentations you generated based on the results of Exercise 4 last week via email. Please remember that Essay 1 is due on June 7 by Midnight. You can upload your essays here.  Let me know if you have any questions about the essay task or anything else.  Wishing you a good week, Markus Feufel

Messages.Author: Markus Feufel
Messages.Content: Dear All, I have been contacted by several of your fellow students who cannot be in Berlin this Friday. So I decided to switch to an online format for this week. We will meet on Friday May 10 at 12:15 via Zoom: https://tu-berlin.zoom.us/j/61094397022?pwd=OHM4VEJVb2ZXbm95Qkt2VnlpMno4UT09 Also, in case you haven't seen, the comprehension test on Lecture 1 is online here: https://isis.tu-berlin.de/mod/quiz/view.php?id=1828479 I extended the deadline until Friday at 10 am for those who may not have seen it yet.  In the future, comprehension tests will always be due the following Wednesday at 22pm. Looking forward to seeing you on Friday - please prepare for the exercise, if haven't done so yet! Best wishes, Markus Feufel

Messages.Author: Markus Feufel
Messages.Content: Dear All,  if you could not come to class this week and take the test there but would like to participate, please take the Basic Knowledge Test I here on ISIS until next Tuesday the lastest. It is a pre test with 10 questions on topics we will cover in the course. I will ask you to retake the text at the end of the class as a post test again. The results are supposed to be feedback for you about your learning and for me as evaluation of the class.  Thank you and best wishes, Markus Feufel
